response.overview: An egyptian prank show that aired back in Ramadan of '91 for over 500+ episodes (runtime is innacurate) on the egyptian TV channel El-Kahera Wel Nas inspired by the shorter similar prank show of the same name presented by the prominent actor Fouad el-Mohandes back in Ramadan of '83. This version however was presented by the actor Ibrahim Nasr where he dresses up as a woman (Zakia Zakaria) & pranks random people on the streets of Egypt. Magdy Ragab plays Nagati & also shows up in some of the episodes. The Zakia costume was designed by Ibrahim himself & the show was directed by Raed Labib.
response.title: The Hidden Camera
